January 12, 2017, Laura was Kate’s teacher

Would it surprise you to know that one of the top students in the entrepreneurship minor at Elon was a dance major? In addition to bringing a fresh perspective to business classes, Kate excelled not only academically but in her creative approach to problem solving. She is innovative, a delight to work with and mature beyond her years. Her strengths include taking initiative, team leadership and absolutely dependable results-oriented follow-through. Kate and I stay in touch and I was so thrilled when she chose to join a startup venture after graduation. I have no doubt she is indispensable to them, reflected by the increase in responsibility in just a few short years. I look forward to watching what she does next and am certain that it will result in great success.
Laura Zavelson

Events Coordinator at The Vinoy Renaissance Resort and Golf Club
January 3, 2017, Kate managed Gabrielle directly

Gabrielle (Gabbie) is an invaluable asset to any team. With an incredibly uplifting and positive persona, it comes as no surprise that her ideas are welcome in any silo in the organization. As the Revenue Catalyst for InsideOut, she has fused the line between Marketing and Sales to better enable our SDRs and to more efficiently align workflows. A quick learner who is always up for a challenge, Gabbie consistently displays a strong work ethic whether she's blogging or setting appointments. I am always impressed by her ability to manage multiple tasks from different functional groups with ease and the quality of work that she delivers. Gabbie brings to the table a variety of skills and thrives in collaborative and solitary environments alike.

Laura Zavelson
Innovator | Builder | Launcher | Strategy  | Marketing | Operations
November 11, 2014, Kate was Laura’s mentor

Laura is one of the most inspiring professors and women I know. She is clear and concise in her expectations in the classroom, yet she challenges her students individually to be the best versions of themselves. She has such a strong passion for Entrepreneurship, and it is evident through her career that she has been more than just successful. Furthermore, she translates that passion to her students. My first course in the business school was with Laura, or "Professor Z." She recognized that as a dance major I had a completely unique background to the other students in the class, but she embraced me and aided whenever I felt behind. Because of her encouragement, I am succeeding in the business school as well as in the Entrepreneurship field. What makes Laura even more unique is her dedication to her students, or clients, outside of the classroom, or office. She has mentored me on multiple projects and has served as an incredible role model in the field. She would make an incredible asset to any team or any university. Her personality is infectious and her knowledge is abundant; she will inspire and lead you to success.
Laura Zavelson

summary: An enthusiastic over-achiever and unconventionalist, I thrive when wearing multiple hats.I am passionate about catalyzing teams through collaboration and am never afraid to lead by example, executing any size job. Through my experiences as an performing artist and corporate marketer, I have developed an unparalleled organic content marketing strategy catalyzed by aesthetics. I leverage this approach at developerprogram.com to create and execute corporate marketing initiatives that enhance corporate positioning, nurture sales prospects, and enhance existing client relationships.For 15 years, developerprogram.com has been creating and managing online business ecosystems for our customers with a focus on application developer and partner programs. Used by many Fortune 500 companies, dpEngine is a full-featured, easy-to-use software platform that can manage most aspects of online business ecosystems. Powered by role-based information access capabilities and a highly configurable business process engine, dpEngine is the right software platform to manage your developer programs, partner programs, or other business ecosystems. For more information, visit www.developerprogram.com.
